contexts.context: ...the 31st day, he was luckily sent to <mark>Gomel</mark> with the same train where he again was arrested...
...more Russians than Jews in the Chișinău pogroms and <mark>Gomel</mark> altogether! How can he not weep?
After the horrible persecution of Chișinău and <mark>Gomel</mark>, after the ridiculous comedy what was the Chișinău...
